# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

# Enable support for MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
set(CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")

if(CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_BINARY_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "In-tree builds are not supported. Run CMake from a separate directory: cmake -B build")
endif()

set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr and automatically regenerate CMakeLists.txt
	include(cmkr.cmake OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

	# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

project(AEBoost)

include(FetchContent)

# Fix warnings about DOWNLOAD_EXTRACT_TIMESTAMP
if(POLICY CMP0135)
	cmake_policy(SET CMP0135 NEW)
endif()
message(STATUS "Fetching raylib (4.5.0)...")
FetchContent_Declare(raylib
	GIT_REPOSITORY
		"https://github.com/raysan5/raylib"
	GIT_TAG
		4.5.0
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(raylib)

message(STATUS "Fetching raygui (3.6)...")
FetchContent_Declare(raygui
	GIT_REPOSITORY
		"https://github.com/raysan5/raygui"
	GIT_TAG
		3.6
)
FetchContent_MakeAvailable(raygui)

# Target: AEBoost
set(AEBoost_SOURCES
	"Manager/Injector.cpp"
	"Manager/Mods.cpp"
	"Manager/Injector.h"
	"Manager/Mods.h"
	"Manager/WMI.h"
	"Mods/AutoRune.cpp"
	"Mods/NetDebug.cpp"
	"Mods/StepShoot.cpp"
	"Mods/Template.cpp"
	"Mods/TotemPetAssist.cpp"
	"AE/AE.cpp"
	"AE/AE.h"
	"Manager/AEBoost.rc"
	"Mods/ModList.txt"
	cmake.toml
)

add_executable(AEBoost)

target_sources(AEBoost PRIVATE ${AEBoost_SOURCES})
source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${AEBoost_SOURCES})

if(MSVC) # msvc
	target_compile_options(AEBoost PRIVATE
		"/GS-"
		"/Gy"
		"/Ob1"
		"/Oi-"
		"/EHs-"
	)
endif()

target_include_directories(AEBoost PRIVATE
	Manager
	AE
	Mods
	${phnt_SOURCE_DIR}
	"${raylib_SOURCE_DIR}/src"
	"${raygui_SOURCE_DIR}/src"
)

target_link_libraries(AEBoost PRIVATE
	winmm
	user32.dll
	raylib
)

if(MSVC) # msvc
	target_link_options(AEBoost PRIVATE
		"/ignore:4078"
		"/INCREMENTAL:NO"
		"/SUBSYSTEM:WINDOWS"
	)
endif()

get_directory_property(CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} DEFINITION VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
if(NOT CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
	set_property(DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} PROPERTY VS_STARTUP_PROJECT AEBoost)
endif()
